item.title: Today I Learned
item.description: A repository to keep track of random little things I learned or thought about each day. The Cosmic Dipole Problem (2023/11/29) CMB features a dipole anisotropy which is interpreted as our motion relative to the cosmic rest frame. If this interpretation is correct, one expects other probe of this relative motion to feature the same cosmic dipole.
